title: Stowaway

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- Stowaway in a player's house. You learn their role. Abilities used on you fail, but abilities used on them also apply to you. 1 night cooldown.
- Strangle the player whose house you're in. You gain their abilities and attributes, but lose previous ones gained through strangling. If your attack fails, your target learns your name.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- When successfully strangling a target, you return to your home.
- Information about your goal: While you can win with any Neutrals, you do not make them Town. Any NKs may spare you, but still have to kill the rest of the Town.

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Kill all evil factions. (You can win with all Neutrals.)

desc:
Post 3710
*Washed up on this place... strange.*
